an4.162:2.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada dandhabhinna?
an4.162:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyapi tibbaragajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam ragajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:2.3: Pakatiyapi tibbadosajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam dosajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:2.4: Pakatiyapi tibbamohajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam mohajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:2.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta dandham anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.162:2.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada dandhabhinna.
an4.162:3.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada khippabhinna?
an4.162:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyapi tibbaragajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam ragajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:3.3: Pakatiyapi tibbadosajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam dosajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:3.4: Pakatiyapi tibbamohajatiko hoti, abhikkhanam mohajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:3.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta khippam anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.162:3.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada khippabhinna.
an4.162:4.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sukha patipada dandhabhinna?
an4.162:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyapi na tibbaragajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam ragajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:4.3: Pakatiyapi na tibbadosajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam dosajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:4.4: Pakatiyapi na tibbamohajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam mohajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:4.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta dandham anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.162:4.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sukha patipada dandhabhinna.
an4.162:5.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sukha patipada khippabhinna?
an4.162:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyapi na tibbaragajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam ragajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:5.3: Pakatiyapi na tibbadosajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam dosajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:5.4: Pakatiyapi na tibbamohajatiko hoti, nabhikkhanam mohajam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an4.162:5.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta khippam anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.162:5.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sukha patipada khippabhinna.
